encoding:report

Note:This goal should be used as a Maven report.

Full name:

de.saxsys.maven.plugins:encoding-maven-plugin:0.1:report

Description:

Generates a encoding report of all files in project structure. Of every file, the encoding will be shown.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: site.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
basedir File - Input dir. Directory where the files under SCM control are located.
User property is: basedir.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
encoding String - General file encoding.
Default value is: ${project.reporting.outputEncoding}.
User property is: encoding.encoding.
fileSet Map - Special FileSet for propertyFiles.

Parameter Details

basedir:

Input dir. Directory where the files under SCM control are located.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: basedir

encoding:

General file encoding.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: encoding.encoding
  • Default: ${project.reporting.outputEncoding}

fileSet:

Special FileSet for propertyFiles.
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Required: No
